attributes.action: ban the video game Rapelay which promote rape and negative attidudes towards women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rapelay is a video game produced in Japan which promotes rape as the gamer trys to stalk and rape a family of 3 women.

More details here

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rapelay

rejection.details: We suggest you approach the British Board of Film Classification with your concerns.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
